testCase.name: Register Asset - should be able to register a asset
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to calculate goal projection
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to calculate projection with sufficient monthly contribution
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to calculate projection with zero monthly contribution
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to calculate projection with insufficient monthly contribution
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to calculate recommended contribution with buffer
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to calculate projection for goal already completed
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to calculate projection for goal with surplus
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to handle goal with zero target amount
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to handle goal with past target date
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should not be able to calculate projection for non-existent investor
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should not be able to calculate projection for non-existent goal
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should not be able to calculate projection for inactive goal
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should not be able to calculate projection with empty scenarios
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should not be able to calculate projection with negative monthly contribution
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should not be able to calculate projection with wrong currency
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should not be able to calculate projection for goal from different investor
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to calculate projection with multiple scenarios
Calculate Investment Goal Projection - should be able to calculate projection and verify date calculations
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should create a conservative scenario with correct properties
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle different currencies in conservative scenario
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle zero amount
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should create a moderate scenario with correct properties
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle different currencies in moderate scenario
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should create an aggressive scenario with correct properties
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle large amounts in aggressive scenario
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should create multiple scenarios with different amounts
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle same amounts for all scenarios
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle different currencies consistently
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle negative amounts in conservative scenario
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle decimal amounts in moderate scenario
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle decimal amounts in aggressive scenario
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle very large amounts
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should handle mixed positive and negative amounts in multiple scenarios
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should return objects with correct structure for individual scenarios
Investment Goal Projection Scenarios - should return array with correct structure for multiple scenarios
Mark Investment Goal As Achieved - should be able to mark investment goal as achieved
Mark Investment Goal As Achieved - should not be able to mark investment goal with non-existent investor
Mark Investment Goal As Achieved - should not be able to mark a non-existent goal
Mark Investment Goal As Achieved - should not be able to mark when goal status is not Active
Mark Investment Goal As Achieved - should not be able to mark when goal belongs to different user
Mark Investment Goal As Achieved - should not be able to mark when goal status is Canceled
Mark Investment Goal As Achieved - should handle optional reason parameter
Mark Investment Goal As Achieved - should not affect other goals when marking one as achieved
Register Goal - should be able to register a investment goal
Register Goal - should be not able to register a investment goal without recorded investor
Update Investment Goal Progress - should be able to update investment goal progress
Update Investment Goal Progress - should not be able to edit a goal with non-existent investor
Update Investment Goal Progress - should not be able to edit a non-existent goal
Update Investment Goal - should be able to update a investment goal with all fields
Update Investment Goal - should be able to update only name
Update Investment Goal - should be able to update only description
Update Investment Goal - should be able to update only target amount
Update Investment Goal - should be able to update only target date
Update Investment Goal - should be able to update only priority
Update Investment Goal - should be able to mark goal as achieved
Update Investment Goal - should be able to cancel a goal
Update Investment Goal - should be able to reactivate a goal
Update Investment Goal - should not be able to update a goal with non-existent investor
Update Investment Goal - should not be able to update a non-existent goal
Update Investment Goal - should not be able to update a goal without providing any field
Update Investment Goal - should not update priority if it is the same as current
Update Investment Goal - should not update status if it is the same as current
Update Investment Goal - should be able to update multiple fields at once
Authenticate Investor - should be able to authenticate an investor with valid credentials
Authenticate Investor - should be not able to authenticate with wrong email
Authenticate Investor - should be not able to authenticate with wrong password
Authenticate Investor - should be able to call encrypter with investor id
Desactive Investor - should be able to desactive investor record
Desactive Investor - should be not able to desactive investor without recorded investor
Register Investor - should be able to register a investor
Register Investor - should be able to hash the password before saving the investor
Register Investor - should create an investor with correct value objects (Email, Name, CPF, Password)
Register Investor - should be able to assign the Conservative risk profile to users aged 25-49 during registration
Register Investor - should be able to assign the Conservative risk profile when user age is exactly 25
Register Investor - should be able to assign the Aggressive risk profile to users under 25 during registration
Register Investor - should be able to assign the Moderate risk profile to users 50 years or older during registration
Register Investor - should be able to assign the Moderate risk profile when user age is exactly 50
Register Investor - should be not able to register a new investor with email is already in use
Register Investor - should be not able to register a new investor with cpf is already in use
Register Investor - should be not able to register a new investor with invalid date of birth
Register Investor - should be not able to register a new investor with date of birth is in the future
Update Investor - should be able to update investor record with new name and new email
Update Investor - should be able to update investor record with new name only
Update Investor - should be able to update investor record with new email only
Update Investor - should be not able to update investor without recorded investor
Update Investor - should be not able to update investor without having informed anything
Add Investment to Portfolio - should be able to add investment to portfolio
Add Investment to Portfolio - should update portfolio allocations after adding investment
Add Investment to Portfolio - should not be able to add investment with non-existent investor
Add Investment to Portfolio - should not be able to add investment with non-existent asset
Add Investment to Portfolio - should not be able to add investment without portfolio
Create Portfolio - should be able to create a portfolio with all fields
Create Portfolio - should be able to create a portfolio without description
Create Portfolio - should not be able to create a portfolio with non-existent investor
Fetch All Investments By PortfolioId - should be able to fetch all investiments by portfolio id
Fetch All Investments By PortfolioId - should be able to fetch investments, returning an empty list if no investments are found
Fetch All Investments By PortfolioId - should be able to paginated all investiments by portfolio id
Fetch All Investments By PortfolioId - should be not able to get investment with non-existent investor
Fetch All Investments By PortfolioId - should be not able to get investment without portfolio
Get Investment By AssetId - should be able to get investment by asset id
Get Investment By AssetId - should be able to get null by asset id
Get Investment By AssetId - should be not able to get investment with non-existent investor
Get Investment By AssetId - should be not able to get investment with non-existent asset
Get Investment By AssetId - should be not able to get investment without portfolio
Update Investment After Transaction - should be able to update an existing investment after a buy transaction
Update Investment After Transaction - should be able to update an existing investment after a sell transaction
Update Investment After Transaction - should be able to update an existing investment after a dividend transaction
Update Investment After Transaction - should be able to create new investment after a buy transaction when none exists
Update Investment After Transaction - should be not able to update an investment with non-existent investor
Update Investment After Transaction - should be not able to update an investment with non-existent transaction
Update Investment After Transaction - should be not able to update an investment with non-existent asset
Update Investment After Transaction - should be not able to update an investment when transaction type is not supported
Update Investment After Transaction - should be not able to update an investment when calculation method fails
Fetch Transactions History By AssetId Service - should be able to fetch transactions history by asset id
Fetch Transactions History By AssetId Service - should be able to fetch transaction history, returning an empty list if no transactions are found for a given asset
Fetch Transactions History By AssetId Service - should be able to paginated all transactions history by asset id
Fetch Transactions History By AssetId Service - should be not able to fetch transaction history if investor does not exist
Fetch Transactions History By AssetId Service - should be not able to fetch transaction history if portfolio does not exist
Fetch Transactions History By PortfolioId Service - should be able to fetch transactions history by portfolio id
Fetch Transactions History By PortfolioId Service - should be able to fetch transaction history, returning an empty list if no transactions are found
Fetch Transactions History By PortfolioId Service - should be able to paginated all transactions history by portfolio id
Fetch Transactions History By PortfolioId Service - should be not able to fetch transaction history if investor does not exist
Fetch Transactions History By PortfolioId Service - should be not able to fetch transaction history if portfolio does not exist
Record Buy Transaction Service - should be able to record buy transaction
Record Buy Transaction Service - should be not able to record with transaction type other than buy
Record Buy Transaction Service - should be not able to record if investor does not exist
Record Buy Transaction Service - should be not able to record if asset does not exist
Record Buy Transaction Service - should be not able to record if portfolio does not exist
Record Buy Transaction Service - should be not able to record if quantity is zero
Record Buy Transaction Service - should be not able to record if price is zero
Record Buy Transaction Service - should be not able to record if fees is zero
Record Dividend Transaction Service - should be able to record dividend transaction
Record Dividend Transaction Service - should be not able to record dividend with transaction type other than dividend
Record Dividend Transaction Service - should be not able to record dividend if investor does not exist
Record Dividend Transaction Service - should be not able to record dividend if asset does not exist
Record Dividend Transaction Service - should be not able to record dividend if portfolio does not exist
Record Dividend Transaction Service - should be not able to record dividend if price is zero
Record Dividend Transaction Service - should be not able to record dividend if income is zero
Record Sell Transaction Service - should be able to record sell transaction
Record Sell Transaction Service - should be not able to record sell with transaction type other than sell
Record Sell Transaction Service - should be not able to record sell if investor does not exist
Record Sell Transaction Service - should be not able to record sell if asset does not exist
Record Sell Transaction Service - should be not able to record sell if portfolio does not exist
Record Sell Transaction Service - should be not able to record sell if quantity is zero
Record Sell Transaction Service - should be not able to record sell if price is zero
Record Sell Transaction Service - should be not able to record sell if fees is zero
Transaction Validator Service - should be able to validate transaction with positive quantity, price and fees
Transaction Validator Service - should be not able to validate transaction if investor does not exist
Transaction Validator Service - should be not able to validate transaction if asset does not exist
Transaction Validator Service - should be not able to validate transaction if portfolio does not exist
Transaction Validator Service - should be not able to validate transaction if price is zero
Edit Transaction Service - should be able to edit a transaction when all fields are filled
Edit Transaction Service - should be able to edit a transaction when at least one field is filled
Edit Transaction Service - should be able to edit a transaction when only type is changed
Edit Transaction Service - should be able to edit a transaction when quantity entered was negative
Edit Transaction Service - should be able to edit a transaction when price entered was negative
Edit Transaction Service - should be able to edit a transaction when fees entered was negative
Edit Transaction Service - should be not able to edit a transaction if investor does not exist
Edit Transaction Service - should be not able to edit a transaction if investor does not exist
Edit Transaction Service - should be not able to edit a transaction if no updatable fields are provided
Edit Transaction Service - should be not able to edit a transaction if quantity is zero
Edit Transaction Service - should be not able to edit a transaction if price is zero
Edit Transaction Service - should be not able to edit a transaction if fees is zero
